https://tmrev.io/movie/26571-Downtown '81 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/5ujDH1Y7skuNSiXfSX3Rp2rE1ZO.jpg The film is a day in the life of a young artist, Jean-Michel Basquiat, who needs to raise money to reclaim the apartment from which he has been evicted. He wanders the downtown streets carrying a painting he hopes to sell, encountering friends, whose lives (and performances) we peek into. Downtown '81
